item.title: New Release. Mizuame v1.2.3
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.2.3! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. New Features Nothing. Improvement Increase the padding around the edges of the note. Bugfix Fixed the Mizuame doesn’t sync “Login Items” on Mac. Fixed the note preview in Settings. Fixed the Settings background color. Others Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.2
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.2.2! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. New Features You can resize the note by dragging its edges. Improvement Change the window size for each settings tab. Bugfix fixed a bug that the settings from being displayed in the foreground. Others Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.1
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.2.1! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. New Features The calculation result will be rounded to 3 digits after the decimal point. (e.g. 1.23456… -> 1.235) You can specify the number of digits after the decimal point. For more details, see also Features. Improvement Added “Add to Login Items”. Refactering. Bugfix Nothing. Others Nothing.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.2.0
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.2.0! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. New Features Formulas written in the note are now automatically calculated. You can choose a text color from the theme, black, dark gray, or gray. Initially, These features is disable. If you want to use them, you need to enable in the general tab of the settings. For more details, see also Features.

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.1.3
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.1.3! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. Improvement Improved redo(command + z) and undo(command + y) functionality. Bugfix Fixed a bug that cannot changeg note size. Open a “Settings” with the keyboard shortcut " command + , “. Others Nothing

item.title: New Release. Mizuame V1.1.1
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.1.1! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. Improvement Compatible with macOS 14 (Sonoma) Bugfix Nothing Others Removed “Settings” from the context menu that opens when you right-click an icon in the menu bar. We decided that “Settings” was not necessary because you can also open “Settings” from the note.

item.title: Mizuame v1.1.0
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.1.0! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. Improvement Implemented a new feature called “Pin” that allows you to keep notes open. Added “Reset settings button” to General tab in Settings. Bugfix Nothing Others Refactored the source code.

item.title: Mizuame v1.0.2
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v1.0.2! And we released the Mizuame on the AppStore. You can find it by Search for “Mizuame”. Improvement Changed a message whne auto saving. Changed a layout of print tab of settings. Bugfix Fixed a app icon background. Added a description about printing to a help tab of the settings.

item.title: Mizuame v0.1.0
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v0.1.0! The note on menu bar. Auto save. Some note theme. Change note size. Change font size. And more.
